item.title: 【Helpdesk】[HELP] Press Handout Sites
item.description:
Hey - I'm currently stuck in finding press handout sites. All I have is epk.tv...

I'm specifically looking for ones music-wise (like UMG, other labels etc.) but am open to as many externally as possible.

If anyone has any to share, please let me know (I'd assume I have a decent chance at getting access with my e-mail so don't worry about any applications). Thank you in advance!
item.author: Lxrus

item.title: 【Albums (lossless)】PACK - The Beatles - 1962–1966 (2023 Edition) [The Red Album] (24 bit/96 kHz) + iTunes Match
item.description:
__

Info

"Four guys, four years, big changes", These guys did this in four years? No rock band had ever sounded so cuddly and approachable (“I Want to Hold Your Hand,” “Please Please Me”) and no pop group so enigmatic and cool to the touch (“Ticket to Ride,” “Norwegian Wood”). Their interpretation of classic pop got more sophisticated as time went on (“Yesterday,” “Girl”), but so did their takes on R&B and soul (“Paperback Writer”). Maybe they drove the culture, maybe they were just exceptional at adapting to it. Either way, you can map the songs here onto pretty much every broad development in popular music in the early ’60s, from the light blues and folk rock of “Love Me Do” and “She Loves You” to the psychedelia of “Day Tripper” and jaggedness of “Eleanor Rigby.”

- Apple -
===================================================================================

Album Info.

Artist: The Beatles
Album: The Beatles 1962-1966 (aka the Red Album) - Compilation Album
Release Year: 10/Nov/2023
Genre: Rock
Quality: FLAC Hi-res (24bit / 96kHz) / AAC (256 kbps) [iTunes Match]
Label: UMC (Universal Music Catalogue)
Released: Universal Music Group
Source: Qobuz WEB & iTunes Match
Size: 2.11 GB (FLAC) / 195.6 MB (AAC)
Duration: 01h 34m 26s
